article_title: Affordable Care Act: What Will It Mean for Retired People?
article_text:
There is been a lot of debate about the Affordable Care Act these days, but not many clear answers on what specific impact the legislation will have on the over-50 set.

With this question in mind, we posed the following question to The Experts: What will the Affordable Care Act mean for retirees?

This discussion relates to a recent ...
